modules.summary: This module provides lang library operations on "future" values defined by the language specification 2020R1.
modules.description:
## Module Overview

This module provides lang library operations on `future` values defined by the language specification 2020R1.

parameters.name: f
parameters.description:
the future to be cancelled
This sets the cancellation flag in the strand corresponding to `f`.
Each time that a strand yields, it will check the cancellation flag
and terminate abnormally if the flag is set.

packages.name: lang.future
packages.summary: This module provides lang library operations on "future" values defined by the language specification 2020R1.
